keyMoments.description: Franky and Robin face off against Tararan and the General Zombies, demonstrating their tactical teamwork.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's ability to work together strategically even when separated.

keyMoments.description: Robin debuts her Cien Fleur: Wing technique, expanding the crew's combat capabilities.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the crew's continued growth and development during the Thriller Bark arc.

name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

keyMoments.description: Inuppe, one of their zombies, defies orders by refusing to attack Nami due to Sanji's chivalrous shadow.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates an unexpected weakness in the zombie army - that shadows retain core personality traits.

keyMoments.description: Absalom strikes down Inuppe for his disobedience, showing the ruthless discipline of the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the internal power dynamics and Absalom's authority as one of the Mysterious Four.

keyMoments.description: Tararan and the General Zombies engage Franky and Robin in battle.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the power of the General Zombies and their role in defending Thriller Bark.
